explanation: [0-0] A man in a yellow T-shirt is sitting in front of a white table. He holds a spoon with white solid in his left hand and a pink balloon in his right hand. In front of him is a bottle of Coca-Cola with two openings on the left and right sides of the bottle, each with a deflated balloon on top. The left one is yellow, and the right one is green. There is a TikTok logo on the far left of the video.
